hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“Camels became scarce at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), so he commanded them to sacrifice cows.”

chapter.ara-name: باب عَنْ كَمْ، تُجْزِئُ الْبَدَنَةُ وَالْبَقَرَةُ
chapter.eng-name: Number of persons for whom a camel and a cow is sufficient
